# Rodentia
Rodentia are a race of humanoid beings resembling rodents.
## Diet
- Can eat raw meat. - Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- Uses their claws to do some Slashing and Blunt damage. - Smaller and more evasive than humans. - Can fit in duffelbags.
## Special
- Can Rummage in disposal chutes, which can sometimes dig up food.
## Drawbacks
- Takes 20% more Blunt damage, and 10% more Slash and Piercing damage. - Always triggers mousetraps, regardless of whether or not they are wearing shoes.
